message:
Hi! 
I am the creator of Challengein "the board game of the modern age", an iPhone app.
I've create the modern version of the board games, but where the user choose the Topic to play with. For example users can choose Technology as topic, but also Lady Gaga, NBA, Twilight, etc.

If you want to try the app http://challengein.com and use "HINIIB" as invitation code (during the sign up process).
;)
